column2:
```r
# combine count data of both seurat objects and create a new one
counts <- cbind(seurat_10x@assays$RNA@counts, seurat_ss2@assays$RNA@data)
meta_both <- rbind(seurat_10x[[c('orig.ident','cell_ontology_class')]],seurat_ss2[[c('orig.ident','cell_ontology_class')]])
seurat_both <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = counts, assay='RNA', meta.data = meta_both)
```
